## useScrollListener() function

Adds a scroll listener to the given element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useScrollListener(listener: Scrollistener, element?: HTMLElement | Window | null, deps?: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listener | Scrollistener | The listener |
|  element | HTMLElement \| Window \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The element to listen for scroll |
|  deps | any\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The list of optional deps |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
